${modID}:ShootoutSenderPower.NAME: Shootout Participant
DESCRIPTIONS: Transfer away all Strikes and Defends you play this turn.

${modID}:ShootoutRecipientPower.NAME: Shootout
DESCRIPTIONS: All Strikes and Defends allies play this turn Transfer to you. They cost 0 for you this turn.

${modID}:ShootoutPlusRecipientPower.NAME: Shootout+
DESCRIPTIONS: All Strikes and Defends allies play this turn Transfer to you and Upgrade. They cost 0 for you this turn.

${modID}:FrontierJusticePower.NAME: FrontierJusticePower
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a debuff is applied to you, apply 1 Artifact to a random ally.
Whenever a debuff is applied to you, apply 1 Artifact to a random ally

${modID}:LoneRangerPower.NAME: Lone Ranger
DESCRIPTIONS: You are taunting an enemy until the start of next turn.
